description:
'''Angelic Upstarts''' are an English [[punk rock]] / [[Oi!]] band formed in [[South Shields]] in 1977. [[AllMusic]] calls them "one of the period's most politically charged and thought-provoking groups". The band espouse an [[Anti-fascism|anti-fascist]] and [[Socialism|socialist]] [[working class]] philosophy, and have been associated with the [[punk subculture|punk]] and [[skinhead|skinhead subcultures]].

The band released eight studio albums in their first decade. After a brief split they reformed in 1988, and a number of times subsequently, with new albums appearing in 1992, 2002, 2011, and 2016. More than two decades after its release, their debut single, "The Murder of [[Liddle Towers]]", was included in ''[[Mojo (magazine)|Mojo]]'' magazine's list of the best punk rock singles of all time.
